General.Name: Tahoe Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Tahoe Group Co., Ltd. engages in real estate business in China. The company develops residential and commercial projects, office buildings, serviced apartments, and commercial pedestrian streets, urban complexes, as well as operates hotels. It also provides property management services. Tahoe Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.
General.Address: Taihe Center, Taihe Plaza, Fuzhou, China, 350001
